evidence.text:
Violation of Habeas Corpus
(see 28 U.S.C. § 2241; U.S. Const. art. I, § 9, cl. 2)
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: a.  Assume jurisdiction over this matter;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: b.  Certify this action as a class action on behalf of the proposed Petitioner Class, appoint the Petitioners as class representatives, and appoint the undersigned counsel as class counsel;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Certify this action as a class action on behalf of the proposed Petitioner Class, appoint the Petitioners as class representatives, and appoint the undersigned counsel as class counsel;

evidence.text: c.  Grant a temporary restraining order to preserve the status quo pending further proceedings;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Grant a temporary restraining order to preserve the status quo pending further proceedings;

evidence.text: d.  Enjoin Respondents from transferring Petitioners out of this district during the pendency of this litigation;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Enjoin Respondents from transferring Petitioners out of this district during the pendency of this litigation;

evidence.text: e.  Grant a writ of habeas corpus to Petitioners that enjoins Respondents from removing them pursuant to the Proclamation;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Grant a writ of habeas corpus to Petitioners that enjoins Respondents from removing them pursuant to the Proclamation;

evidence.text: f.  Declare unlawful the Proclamation;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: g.  Enjoin Respondents from applying the Proclamation to Petitioners without providing 30- day notice and an opportunity to respond to the designation prior to the removal date;
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Enjoin Respondents from applying the Proclamation to Petitioners without providing 30-day notice and an opportunity to respond to the designation prior to the removal date;

evidence.text: h.  Award Petitioners’ counsel reasonable attorneys’ fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act, and any other applicable statute or regulation; and
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Award Petitioners’ counsel reasonable attorneys’ fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act, and any other applicable statute or regulation; and

evidence.text: i.  Grant such further relief as the Court deems just, equitable, and appropriate.
evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Grant such further relief as the Court deems just, equitable, and appropriate.
